title: Foxworth Thursday: Fox's New Podcast, Aging Rappers, and The Brady Rules. Also,  Aaron Rodgers and Psychedelics.
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the makings of Domonique's upcoming solo podcast The Domonique Foxworth Show (2:05), watching rappers age and parlay their fame and wealth into mainstream businesses (14:24), Jon Gruden apologizing for his racist, anti-gay, and misogynistic emails to a receptive audience at the Little Rock Touchdown Club (26:23), Tom Brady's training camp absence (31:13), and Aaron Rodgers' use of ayahuasca (38:50).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time Foxworth Thursday: Fox's New Podcast, Aging Rappers, and The Brady Rules. Also,  Aaron Rodgers and Psychedelics.
